entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with rain showers and flurries changing to flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
